name: Kroen CMS
body:
This is the first ever source code of KROEN CMS as of March 2011.
The original file was 2MB long, I had to trim it.  

You should still be able to run this code with existing stuff. 
The Kroen CMS of 2011 is not comparable with the Kroen CMS of now.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
